TITLE: Episode 24 - Fairness Is a Spook
DESCRIPTION: Do "voluntary taxes" exist? Is fairness real? Are mutants dangerous? I have Ryan back on to cover for Phil and we talk about voluntary taxation, lotteries, fairness as a concept, and Halloween legislation. Join us for an impromptu conversation and hopefully a good time.
